SELECT pa.id , pa.account_no , pa.account_type_code , pa.account_name , pa.identity_no , pa.status , pa.is_allow_recharge , pa.is_allow_withdraw , pa.is_allow_overdraft , pa.is_allow_transfer_in , pa.is_allow_transfer_out , pa.remark , pa.create_time , pa.update_time FROM pay_account pa, pay_identity_info pii WHERE pii.identity_no = pa.identity_no AND pii.identity_type = pa.identity_type AND pii.user_no = #{userno} AND pii.user_type = #{usertype}
AND pa.account_type_code = #{accounttypecode}

SELECT id, identity_no, account_no, account_type_code, available_amount, frozen_amount, currency_code, remark FROM pay_account_asset paa WHERE paa.account_no = #{account_no}
AND paa.account_type_code = #{account_type_code}

SELECT pica.channel_account_no FROM pay_identity_channel_account pica, pay_identity_info pii WHERE pii.identity_no = pica.identity_no AND pii.identity_type = pica.identity_type AND pii.user_no = #{userno} AND pii.user_type =#{usertype} AND pica.channel_type = #{channel_type}
